short_summary: Landfill remediation services, including all necessary tools, services, materials, travel, and labour on equipment for Public Works & Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of Transport Canada in Ottawa, Ontario
description: Sodium lactate substrate injection events at the Gloucester Landfill for remediation of solvents and solids via biodegradation
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Notice Type: Request for Proposal

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a tender for the supply of a Lactate Substrate Solution (LSS) and the conduct of Lactate Substrate Solution Injection Events (LSSIE) at the Gloucester Landfill in Ottawa, Ontario.

##### Tender Information
- **Reference Number:** WS4361727612
- **Solicitation Number:** WS4361727612
- **Tender Closing Date:** March 5, 2024, 14:00 EST
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 1, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive, Open Bidding

##### Contract Requirements
The selected bidder will be responsible for the supply of a Lactate Substrate Solution (LSS) and the conduct of Lactate Substrate Solution Injection Events (LSSIE) at the Gloucester Landfill site. The bidder must ensure that all necessary tools, services, materials, travel, and labor on equipment are provided in accordance with the Statement of Work.

##### Security Requirements
There are security requirements associated with this procurement, which the bidder must meet.

##### Tender Evaluation Criteria
Variations or combinations of the above methods will be used to evaluate tender submissions.

##### Trade Agreements
The tender is open to bidders who are eligible under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

##### Contact Information
For more information, please contact:

* Name: Stefan Ruest (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [stefan.ruest@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stefan.ruest@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Ariba Discovery Posting: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18643476?extsite=MTg2NDM0NzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18643476?extsite=MTg2NDM0NzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
